column4: hey, i want to upgrade to hardy development because i want to develop a patch for something, but i cannot be bothered to do a frsh install. is there a way to upgrade to hardy without manually changing sources.list?
yeah, understand its beta, dont mind if it borks my system. i just dont want to upgrade up changing the sources.list coz that usually messes things up.
i need to develop a patch against the latest gnome sources.....
consider just installing hardy in a virtual machine and develop there
